# Ignorar volumes do Docker postgres_data/

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# Setup Docker - BigChat Brasil
## Para os Avaliadores
Este guia foi criado para facilitar a execução do projeto em um ambiente limpo usando Docker.
## ⚡ Quick Start
### Opção 1: Rodar TUDO com Docker (Mais Simples)
```bash # Na raiz do projeto docker-compose up -d ```
Aguarde alguns minutos para o build e inicialização. A API estará disponível em: - http://localhost:8080/api - Health check: http://localhost:8080/api/actuator/health
### Opção 2: Apenas o Banco de Dados no Docker
```bash # Subir apenas o PostgreSQL docker-compose up postgres -d
# Rodar a aplicação via Maven cd infrastructure mvn spring-boot:run -Dspring-boot.run.profiles=local ```
## Pré-requisitos
- Docker Desktop instalado e rodando - Docker Compose (já vem com Docker Desktop) - Git (para clonar o repositório)
## Configuração Detalhada
### 1. Clonar o Repositório
```bash git clone <url-do-repositorio> cd bigchatbrasil ```
### 2. Verificar Docker
```bash docker --version docker-compose --version ```
### 3. Iniciar os Serviços
#### Windows ```cmd docker-manager.bat start ```
#### Linux/Mac ou Windows (manual) ```bash docker-compose up -d ```
### 4. Verificar Status
```bash # Ver containers rodando docker-compose ps
# Ver logs docker-compose logs -f
# Ver logs apenas da aplicação docker-compose logs -f app
# Ver logs apenas do banco docker-compose logs -f postgres ```
### 5. Testar a API
```bash # Health check curl http://localhost:8080/api/actuator/health
# Criar um cliente (exemplo) curl -X POST http://localhost:8080/api/clientes \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -d '{ "nome": "João Silva", "sexo": "MASCULINO", "email": "joao@email.com", "documento": "12345678900", "telefone": "11999999999", "sobre": "Cliente teste" }' ```
## ️ Acesso ao Banco de Dados
Você pode conectar ao PostgreSQL usando qualquer cliente SQL:
- **Host**: localhost - **Port**: 5432 - **Database**: bigchatbrasil - **Username**: postgres - **Password**: postgres
### Exemplo com psql (linha de comando)
```bash docker exec -it bigchatbrasil-postgres psql -U postgres -d bigchatbrasil ```
### Exemplo com DBeaver, DataGrip, pgAdmin
Crie uma nova conexão com as credenciais acima.
## Parar os Serviços
```bash # Parar sem remover volumes (mantém dados) docker-compose down
# Parar e remover volumes (limpa tudo) docker-compose down -v ```
## Rebuild da Aplicação
Se você fez alterações no código:
```bash # Rebuild e restart docker-compose up -d --build ```
## Troubleshooting
### Porta já em uso
Se a porta 5432 ou 8080 já estiver em uso:
**Opção 1**: Parar o serviço que está usando a porta **Opção 2**: Modificar as portas no `docker-compose.yml`:
```yaml ports: - "5433:5432" # PostgreSQL na porta 5433 - "8081:8080" # API na porta 8081 ```
### Container não inicia
```bash # Ver logs detalhados docker-compose logs
# Remover tudo e começar do zero docker-compose down -v docker-compose up -d ```
### Erro de conexão com banco
Aguarde alguns segundos. O banco precisa estar completamente iniciado antes da aplicação conectar.
```bash # Verificar health do banco docker-compose exec postgres pg_isready -U postgres ```
## Estrutura de Arquivos Docker
``` bigchatbrasil/ ├── docker-compose.yml # Orquestração dos containers ├── Dockerfile # Build da aplicação Java ├── init-db.sql # Script de inicialização do DB ├── docker-manager.bat # Helper script para Windows └── .dockerignore # Arquivos ignorados no build ```
## ️ Como Funciona
1. **PostgreSQL Container**: - Inicia primeiro - Cria o banco `bigchatbrasil` - Executa o script `init-db.sql` - Expõe porta 5432
2. **Aplicação Container**: - Aguarda o PostgreSQL estar healthy - Faz build da aplicação (multi-stage build) - Inicia Spring Boot - Expõe porta 8080
3. **Network**: - Containers se comunicam via rede interna - Aplicação acessa o banco via hostname `postgres`
## ✅ Checklist de Verificação
- [ ] Docker Desktop está rodando - [ ] Portas 5432 e 8080 estão livres - [ ] `docker-compose up -d` executou sem erros - [ ] `docker-compose ps` mostra containers rodando - [ ] http://localhost:8080/api/actuator/health retorna `{"status":"UP"}` - [ ] É possível criar um cliente via API
## Suporte
Se encontrar problemas, verifique:
1. Logs: `docker-compose logs -f` 2. Status dos containers: `docker-compose ps` 3. Health do banco: `docker-compose exec postgres pg_isready -U postgres` 4. Versão do Docker: `docker --version`
## Ambientes
- **local**: Desenvolvimento local (IDE + Docker DB) - **docker**: Ambiente completo em Docker - **Produção**: Configurar variáveis de ambiente conforme necessário

option.value:
version: '3.8'
# Docker Compose simplificado - APENAS PostgreSQL # Use este arquivo para desenvolvimento local quando quiser rodar a aplicação pela IDE
services: postgres: image: postgres:16-alpine container_name: bigchatbrasil-postgres environment: POSTGRES_DB: bigchatbrasil POSTGRES_USER: postgres POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres ports: - "5432:5432" volumes: - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data - ./init-db.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init-db.sql networks: - bigchatbrasil-network healthcheck: test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U postgres"] interval: 10s timeout: 5s retries: 5
volumes: postgres_data:
networks: bigchatbrasil-network: driver: bridge

option.value:
version: '3.8'
# Docker Compose simplificado - APENAS PostgreSQL # Use este arquivo para desenvolvimento local quando quiser rodar a aplicação pela IDE
services: postgres: image: postgres:16-alpine container_name: bigchatbrasil-postgres environment: POSTGRES_DB: bigchatbrasil POSTGRES_USER: postgres POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres ports: - "5432:5432" volumes: - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data - ./init-db.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init-db.sql networks: - bigchatbrasil-network healthcheck: test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U postgres"] interval: 10s timeout: 5s retries: 5
volumes: postgres_data:
networks: bigchatbrasil-network: driver: bridge

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
version: '3.8'
services: postgres: image: postgres:16-alpine container_name: bigchatbrasil-postgres environment: POSTGRES_DB: bigchatbrasil POSTGRES_USER: postgres POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres ports: - "5432:5432" volumes: - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data - ./init-db.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init-db.sql networks: - bigchatbrasil-network healthcheck: test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U postgres"] interval: 10s timeout: 5s retries: 5
app: build: context: . dockerfile: Dockerfile container_name: bigchatbrasil-app environment: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE: docker DB_HOST: postgres DB_PORT: 5432 DB_NAME: bigchatbrasil DB_USERNAME: postgres DB_PASSWORD: postgres ports: - "8080:8080" depends_on: postgres: condition: service_healthy networks: - bigchatbrasil-network
volumes: postgres_data:
networks: bigchatbrasil-network: driver: bridge

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
version: '3.8'
services: postgres: image: postgres:16-alpine container_name: bigchatbrasil-postgres restart: unless-stopped environment: POSTGRES_DB: bigchatbrasil POSTGRES_USER: postgres POSTGRES_PASSWORD: postgres ports: - "5432:5432" volumes: - postgres_data:/var/lib/postgresql/data - ./init-db.sql:/docker-entrypoint-initdb.d/init-db.sql networks: - bigchatbrasil-network healthcheck: test: ["CMD-SHELL", "pg_isready -U postgres"] interval: 10s timeout: 5s retries: 5
app: build: context: . dockerfile: Dockerfile container_name: bigchatbrasil-app restart: unless-stopped environment: SPRING_PROFILES_ACTIVE: docker DB_HOST: postgres DB_PORT: 5432 DB_NAME: bigchatbrasil DB_USERNAME: postgres DB_PASSWORD: postgres ports: - "8080:8080" depends_on: postgres: condition: service_healthy networks: - bigchatbrasil-network
volumes: postgres_data:
networks: bigchatbrasil-network: driver: bridge

option.value:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion> <parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>4.0.0</version> <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository --> </parent> <groupId>io.github.dudupuci</groupId> <artifactId>infrastructure</artifactId> <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> <name>infrastructure</name> <description>infrastructure</description> <url/> <licenses> <license/> </licenses> <developers> <developer/> </developers> <scm> <connection/> <developerConnection/> <tag/> <url/> </scm> <properties> <java.version>21</java.version> </properties> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>io.github.dudupuci</groupId> <artifactId>domain</artifactId> <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>io.github.dudupuci</groupId> <artifactId>application</artifactId> <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version> </dependency> <!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.hibernate.validator/hibernate-validator --> <dependency> <groupId>org.hibernate.validator</groupId> <artifactId>hibernate-validator</artifactId> <version>9.1.0.Final</version> </dependency> <!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/io.swagger.core.v3/swagger-annotations --> <dependency> <groupId>io.swagger.core.v3</groupId> <artifactId>swagger-annotations</artifactId> <version>2.2.41</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-webmvc</artifactId> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-devtools</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> <optional>true</optional> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-webmvc-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
</project>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <project xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 https://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd"> <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion> <parent> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-parent</artifactId> <version>4.0.0</version> <relativePath/> <!-- lookup parent from repository --> </parent> <groupId>io.github.dudupuci</groupId> <artifactId>infrastructure</artifactId> <version>0.0.1-SNAPSHOT</version> <name>infrastructure</name> <description>infrastructure</description> <url/> <licenses> <license/> </licenses> <developers> <developer/> </developers> <scm> <connection/> <developerConnection/> <tag/> <url/> </scm> <properties> <java.version>21</java.version> </properties> <dependencies> <dependency> <groupId>io.github.dudupuci</groupId> <artifactId>domain</artifactId> <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>io.github.dudupuci</groupId> <artifactId>application</artifactId> <version>1.0-SNAPSHOT</version> </dependency> <!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/org.hibernate.validator/hibernate-validator --> <dependency> <groupId>org.hibernate.validator</groupId> <artifactId>hibernate-validator</artifactId> <version>9.1.0.Final</version> </dependency> <!-- https://mvnrepository.com/artifact/io.swagger.core.v3/swagger-annotations --> <dependency> <groupId>io.swagger.core.v3</groupId> <artifactId>swagger-annotations</artifactId> <version>2.2.41</version> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-webmvc</artifactId> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-actuator</artifactId> </dependency>
<dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-devtools</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> <optional>true</optional> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.postgresql</groupId> <artifactId>postgresql</artifactId> <scope>runtime</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-data-jpa-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> <dependency> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-starter-webmvc-test</artifactId> <scope>test</scope> </dependency> </dependencies>
<build> <plugins> <plugin> <groupId>org.springframework.boot</groupId> <artifactId>spring-boot-maven-plugin</artifactId> </plugin> </plugins> </build>
</project>

jpa: hibernate: ddl-auto: create-drop show-sql: true properties: hibernate: format_sql: true

option.value:

jpa: hibernate: ddl-auto: create-drop show-sql: true properties: hibernate: format_sql: true

option.name: originalContent
option.value:
spring: application: name: bigchatbrasil
datasource: url: jdbc:postgresql://${DB_HOST:localhost}:${DB_PORT:5432}/${DB_NAME:bigchatbrasil} username: ${DB_USERNAME:postgres} password: ${DB_PASSWORD:postgres} driver-class-name: org.postgresql.Driver
jpa: hibernate: ddl-auto: update show-sql: true properties: hibernate: dialect: org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQLDialect format_sql: true open-in-view: false
server: port: 8080 servlet: context-path: /api
management: endpoints: web: exposure: include: health,info base-path: /actuator endpoint: health: show-details: always

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
spring: application: name: bigchatbrasil
datasource: url: jdbc:postgresql://${DB_HOST:localhost}:${DB_PORT:5432}/${DB_NAME:bigchatbrasil} username: ${DB_USERNAME:postgres} password: ${DB_PASSWORD:postgres} driver-class-name: org.postgresql.Driver
jpa: hibernate: ddl-auto: update show-sql: true properties: hibernate: dialect: org.hibernate.dialect.PostgreSQLDialect format_sql: true open-in-view: false
server: port: 8080 servlet: context-path: /api
management: endpoints: web: exposure: include: health,info base-path: /actuator endpoint: health: show-details: when-authorized

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
@echo off setlocal enabledelayedexpansion
echo ======================================== echo BigChat Brasil - Testes Rápidos echo ======================================== echo.
set BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080/api
:: Teste 1: Health Check echo [1/6] Testando Health Check... curl -s %BASE_URL%/actuator/health if %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( echo ✓ Health Check OK ) else ( echo ✗ Health Check FALHOU goto error ) echo.
:: Teste 2: Criar Cliente echo [2/6] Criando Cliente... curl -s -X POST %BASE_URL%/clientes ^ -H "Content-Type: application/json" ^ -d "{\"nome\":\"João Silva\",\"sexo\":\"MASCULINO\",\"email\":\"joao@email.com\",\"documento\":\"12345678900\",\"telefone\":\"11999999999\",\"sobre\":\"Cliente teste\"}" ^ > cliente_response.json
if %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( echo ✓ Cliente criado type cliente_response.json ) else ( echo ✗ Falha ao criar cliente goto error ) echo.
:: Teste 3: Buscar Cliente echo [3/6] Buscando Cliente ID 1... curl -s %BASE_URL%/clientes/1 if %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( echo ✓ Busca de cliente OK ) else ( echo ✗ Falha ao buscar cliente ) echo.
:: Teste 4: Criar Empresa echo [4/6] Criando Empresa... curl -s -X POST %BASE_URL%/empresas ^ -H "Content-Type: application/json" ^ -d "{\"razaoSocial\":\"Empresa Teste Ltda\",\"cnpj\":\"12345678000190\",\"telefone\":\"1133334444\",\"email\":\"contato@empresa.com\"}" ^ > empresa_response.json
if %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( echo ✓ Empresa criada type empresa_response.json ) else ( echo ✗ Falha ao criar empresa goto error ) echo.
:: Teste 5: Buscar Empresa echo [5/6] Buscando Empresa ID 1... curl -s %BASE_URL%/empresas/1 if %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( echo ✓ Busca de empresa OK ) else ( echo ✗ Falha ao buscar empresa ) echo.
:: Teste 6: Verificar Banco echo [6/6] Verificando conexão com banco... docker exec bigchatbrasil-postgres psql -U postgres -d bigchatbrasil -c "SELECT COUNT(*) as total_clientes FROM clientes;" 2>nul if %ERRORLEVEL% EQU 0 ( echo ✓ Banco acessível ) else ( echo ✗ Falha ao acessar banco ) echo.
:: Limpeza del cliente_response.json 2>nul del empresa_response.json 2>nul
echo ======================================== echo ✓ Todos os testes passaram! echo ======================================== goto end
:error echo. echo ======================================== echo ✗ Alguns testes falharam echo ======================================== echo. echo Verifique se: echo 1. Docker está rodando echo 2. Containers estão ativos: docker-compose ps echo 3. API está respondendo: curl http://localhost:8080/api/actuator/health echo 4. Veja os logs: docker-compose logs -f exit /b 1
:end endlocal

option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
#!/bin/bash
# BigChat Brasil - Script de Testes Rápidos # Para Linux/Mac
echo "========================================" echo " BigChat Brasil - Testes Rápidos" echo "========================================" echo ""
BASE_URL="http://localhost:8080/api" PASSED=0 FAILED=0
# Cores GREEN='\033[0;32m' RED='\033[0;31m' NC='\033[0m' # No Color
# Função para testar test_endpoint() { local name=$1 local cmd=$2
echo -n "[$name] " if eval "$cmd" > /dev/null 2>&1; then echo -e "${GREEN}✓ PASSOU${NC}" ((PASSED++)) else echo -e "${RED}✗ FALHOU${NC}" ((FAILED++)) fi }
# Teste 1: Health Check echo "[1/6] Testando Health Check..." response=$(curl -s $BASE_URL/actuator/health) if [[ $response == *"UP"* ]]; then echo -e "${GREEN}✓ Health Check OK${NC}" ((PASSED++)) else echo -e "${RED}✗ Health Check FALHOU${NC}" ((FAILED++)) fi echo ""
# Teste 2: Criar Cliente echo "[2/6] Criando Cliente..." response=$(curl -s -X POST $BASE_URL/clientes \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -d '{ "nome": "João Silva", "sexo": "MASCULINO", "email": "joao@email.com", "documento": "12345678900", "telefone": "11999999999", "sobre": "Cliente teste" }')
if [[ $response == *"id"* ]]; then echo -e "${GREEN}✓ Cliente criado${NC}" echo $response | jq '.' 2>/dev/null || echo $response ((PASSED++)) else echo -e "${RED}✗ Falha ao criar cliente${NC}" ((FAILED++)) fi echo ""
# Teste 3: Buscar Cliente echo "[3/6] Buscando Cliente ID 1..." response=$(curl -s $BASE_URL/clientes/1) if [[ $response == *"id"* ]]; then echo -e "${GREEN}✓ Busca de cliente OK${NC}" ((PASSED++)) else echo -e "${RED}✗ Falha ao buscar cliente${NC}" ((FAILED++)) fi echo ""
# Teste 4: Criar Empresa echo "[4/6] Criando Empresa..." response=$(curl -s -X POST $BASE_URL/empresas \ -H "Content-Type: application/json" \ -d '{ "razaoSocial": "Empresa Teste Ltda", "cnpj": "12345678000190", "telefone": "1133334444", "email": "contato@empresa.com" }')
if [[ $response == *"id"* ]]; then echo -e "${GREEN}✓ Empresa criada${NC}" echo $response | jq '.' 2>/dev/null || echo $response ((PASSED++)) else echo -e "${RED}✗ Falha ao criar empresa${NC}" ((FAILED++)) fi echo ""
# Teste 5: Buscar Empresa echo "[5/6] Buscando Empresa ID 1..." response=$(curl -s $BASE_URL/empresas/1) if [[ $response == *"id"* ]]; then echo -e "${GREEN}✓ Busca de empresa OK${NC}" ((PASSED++)) else echo -e "${RED}✗ Falha ao buscar empresa${NC}" ((FAILED++)) fi echo ""
# Teste 6: Verificar Banco echo "[6/6] Verificando conexão com banco..." if docker exec bigchatbrasil-postgres psql -U postgres -d bigchatbrasil -c "SELECT COUNT(*) FROM clientes;" > /dev/null 2>&1; then echo -e "${GREEN}✓ Banco acessível${NC}" ((PASSED++)) else echo -e "${RED}✗ Falha ao acessar banco${NC}" ((FAILED++)) fi echo ""
# Resultado Final echo "========================================" if [ $FAILED -eq 0 ]; then echo -e "${GREEN}✓ Todos os testes passaram! ($PASSED/6)${NC}" exit 0 else echo -e "${RED}✗ Alguns testes falharam ($FAILED/6 falharam)${NC}" echo "" echo "Verifique se:" echo "1. Docker está rodando" echo "2. Containers estão ativos: docker-compose ps" echo "3. API está respondendo: curl $BASE_URL/actuator/health" echo "4. Veja os logs: docker-compose logs -f" exit 1 fi
